DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate feasibility effectiveness Internet-delivered Cognitive Behavior Therapy ( ICBT ) child ( 7-11 year ) Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder ( OCD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-based Cognitive-behavior Therapy Children With Obsessive-compulsive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study investigate Internet-delivered Cognitive Behavior Therapy ( ICBT ) feasible effective treatment child ( 7-11 year ) Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder ( OCD ) . The design study pilot study 16 participant . The treatment duration 12 week . The primary outcome measure Children 's Yale-Brown Obsessive Compulsive Scale ( CY-BOCS ) . Study participant follow 3 month treatment .
DOC.criteria: Primary DSM5 diagnosis OCD Total score â‰¥16 Children 's YaleBrown ObsessiveCompulsive Scale ( CYBOCS ) Age 711 year Ability understand Swedish Daily access Internet A parent coparticipate treatment Participants psychotropic medication must stable dose last 6 week prior baseline assessment Diagnosed autism spectrum disorder , psychosis , bipolar disorder , severe eat disorder , organic brain disorder , learn disability Suicidal ideation Not able understand basic ICBT selfhelp material Have complete course CBT OCD within last 12 month ( define least 5 session CBT include exposure response prevention ) Ongoing psychological treatment OCD another anxiety disorder
